Ukraine's popular 'Iron General' replaced as war grinds onUkrainian armed forces commander General Valeriy Zaluzhnyi, who was replaced on Thursday, became a national hero for repelling Moscow's invading forces two years ago but suffered battlefield setbacks as the war ground on. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 17:05:06 GMT G3BSO64B2VJA5CSQMWCVYXRI54 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-popular-iron-general-replaced-war-grinds-2024-02-08/Tom Balmforth世界欧洲
Liberia orders central bank audit as part of anti-graft driveLiberia's President Joseph Boakai has commissioned an audit of three key government institutions, including the central bank, as part of efforts to tackle graft, the presidency said on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 17:03:08 GMT BHOXKKNZNJO6JH6CMRMHO25EDA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/liberia-orders-central-bank-audit-part-anti-graft-drive-2024-02-08/Reuters世界非洲
Five facts about Oleksandr Syrskyi, Ukraine's new army chiefColonel-General Oleksandr Syrskyi, who has led Ukraine's ground forces since 2019, was promoted to commander of the armed forces on Thursday as the war with Russia nears its third year. He replaces Valeriy Zaluzhnyi. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 16:51:40 GMT 2A3NP2NIKFKZ7GWMJQGJOCF4LY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Five-facts-about-oleksandr-syrskyi-ukraines-new-army-chief-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine announces changes at top of militaryUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Thursday he met army chief Valeriy Zaluzhnyi and that the time had come for changes in the military leadership, but that Kyiv's top general should remain "on his team". Thu, 08 Feb 2024 16:43:57 GMT 4NCL7LE2KVKFNDJPLXGXPG3Q24 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-announces-changes-top-military-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Israeli army 'peeling back' Khan Younis, believes Hamas Gaza chief is thereIsraeli forces are "peeling back" Hamas infrastructure in Khan Younis, more than two months after entering the Gaza Strip's main southern city, and believe the Palestinian faction's Gaza chief is hiding there, a senior military officer said on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 16:40:09 GMT ATKIAMZCAJP6TFM7FJNCH5W3ZA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-army-peeling-back-khan-younis- believes-hamas-gaza-chief-is-there-2024-02-08/Dan Williams世界中东
Ukraine changes military leadership - KyivUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Thursday the time had come to change the country's military leadership in the war against Russia, replacing army chief General Valeriy Zaluzhnyi. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 16:16:54 GMT TBMOL36W3VJ4LNE72XK27H5YZU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-says-time-has-come-changes-top-military-2024-02-08/Reuters世界欧洲
UN calls for mental health support for children impacted by Gaza warA United Nations committee appealed on Thursday for "massive psychosocial support" for children traumatised by violence in Gaza, the occupied West Bank and Israel and said it would review Israel's treatment of children later this year. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 15:59:44 GMT 2THHQKANFILFHBCYUIYJATGBA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/un-calls-mental-health-support-children-impacted-by-gaza-war-2024-02-08/Reuters世界中东
Exclusive: US-backed force in Syria: more air defence needed after deadly drone attackA force that has been the backbone of the U.S.-led campaign against Islamic State said additional air defences should be deployed in northeast Syria after six of its fighters were killed in a drone attack it blamed on pro-Iran factions. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 15:56:39 GMT WN2KJS424ZO7DDIDRTKV2T3JGQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-backed-force-syria-more-air-defence-needed-after-deadly-drone-attack-2024-02-08/Maya Gebeily世界中东
US Senate voting on $95 bln Ukraine, Israel aid bill after failed border dealThe U.S. Senate began to vote on Thursday on a $95.34 billion bill that includes aid for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan, after Republicans blocked compromise legislation that also included a long-sought overhaul of immigration policy. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 15:15:40 GMT 2OHFQCKNYFNKPN7TRFFXJWGARM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-senate-vote-95-bln-ukraine-israel-aid-bill-after-failed-border-deal-2024-02-08/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
US offers $10mln reward for information on Hive ransomware leadersThe United States is offering a reward of up to $10 million for information leading to the identification or location of key leaders in the Hive ransomware organized crime group, the State Department said in a statement on Thursday. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 14:32:08 GMT 76RMG4RNE5M4ZLU7ZBA4YVHHVI https://www.reuters.com/technology/us-offers-10mln-reward-information-hive-ransomware-leaders-2024-02-08/Reuters技术
Putin and Xi reject US 'interference', praise their own ties and trade - KremlinRussian President Vladimir Putin and Chinese President Xi Jinping spoke by phone on Thursday and both rejected what they called U.S. interference in the affairs of other countries, the Kremlin said. Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:18:06 GMT X2NVIGZQYVNETKDM3K773G7RVU https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-xi-reject-us-interference-praise-their-own-ties-trade-kremlin-2024-02-08/Reuters世界
